response.original_title: Pyar Kare Dis: Feel the Power of Love
response.overview: Directed a Sindhi feature film "Pyar Kare Dis" on digital format. Jagjit Singh, Shaan, Roop Kumar Rathore and Richa Sharma sang for the first time in Sindhi language. A musical treat for the audience. the story of the film is based on Love Story, it is a Sindhi language film, very few films are produced in this language. The film also stars Bollywood actress Preeti Jhangiani. The film is directed by Kamal Nathani.
response.title: Pyar Kare Dis: Feel the Power of Love
